reviewText: I used to buy a lot of the girls gone wild dvd's back when they first appeared on the video market, but many of them were just plain flat out awful by that meaning the girls were ugly.  Now keep in mind this was before the bit torrent and download sites started to appear on the web so after spending my hard earned cash on these dvds only to find out most of them sucked, I swore off girls gone wild.  But then I saw this title in an fye music store.  Since I have a liking for girls with big boobs I decided to give ggw another shot.  Well, the content turned out to be alright but not great, but believe me there are far more suckier ggw titles. In this title we have a mixture of scenes where there are girls flashing in clubs and then there are scenes where they focus on 1 girl with large breasts who goes in the ggw bus and performs a striptease.  Sadly the girls in the solo scenes they tend to focus on are not very good looking, plus there is no explicit mastubation or toy play either.  The random girls they show flashing in the clubs on the other hand are pretty good looking and all have big breasts but they don't focus on them as much as they do the solo scenes.  I'm giving this title 3 stars because the club flashing girls were gorgous but in my opinion they should have had girls who were actually good looking doing the solo scenes.
